archiefmat.titel: Besloten testamenten en codicillen met akten van superscriptie. Gedeponeerd 1761 - 1815
archiefmat.titel_eng: Sealed last will and testaments and codicils with deeds of superscription. Deposited 1761 - 1815
archiefmat.notes:
Period: 1 March 1761 - 31 August 1815.

Only after opening were the sealed last will and testaments and codicils transferred to the series of final drafts as appendices to the deeds of disclosure. Since notes concerning the registration of superscription at the Secretary's office were added to the deeds of superscription, the documents in these numbers are placed only after the registers of last will and testaments.

The dates mentioned are the dates of registration, not the dates the original documents were drawn up.
